Task Title: Homepage Navigation Sort - Put each category Of bedsheet individually and Carpets - Rest that we are not selling should be in more
Predicted Intent: For sellers working with multiple categories, it's always helpful to show product pages category-wise because think about it, there's a seller that has suits and sarees, someone who has come to the product page because they were interested in a saree are more likely to purchase if the other options they see are sarees as well.
